gobblin.config.store.hdfs

Class SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHDFSConfigStore>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory

    public class SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
extends Object
implements ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHDFSConfigStore>
    An implementation of ConfigStoreFactory for creating SimpleHDFSConfigStores. This class only works the physical scheme HDFS_SCHEME_NAME.
    See Also:
    SimpleHDFSConfigStore

    • Method Detail

      • getScheme

        public String getScheme()
        Specified by:
        getScheme in interface ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHDFSConfigStore>
        Returns:
        the URI scheme for which this configuration store factory is responsible. All the configuration store created by this configuration factory will share the same scheme name.

      • createConfigStore

        public SimpleHDFSConfigStore createConfigStore(URI configKey)
                                        throws ConfigStoreCreationException
        Creates a SimpleHDFSConfigStore for the given URI. The URI specified should be the fully qualified path to the dataset in question. For example, simple-hdfs://[authority]:[port][path-to-config-store][path-to-dataset]. It is important to note that the path to the config store on HDFS must also be specified. The combination [path-to-config-store][path-to-dataset] need not specify an actual Path on HDFS.

        If the URI does not contain an authority, a default authority and root directory are provided. The default authority is taken from the NameNode URI the current process is co-located with. The default path is "/user/[current-user]/".

        Specified by:
        createConfigStore in interface ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHDFSConfigStore>
        Parameters:
        configKey - The URI of the config key that needs to be accessed.
        Returns:
        a SimpleHDFSConfigStore configured with the the given URI.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreCreationException - if the SimpleHDFSConfigStore could not be created.

      • getPhysicalScheme

        protected String getPhysicalScheme()
        Returns the physical scheme this ConfigStoreFactory is responsible for. To support new HDFS FileSystem implementations, subclasses should override this method.

      • getDefaultRootDir

        protected Path getDefaultRootDir()
                          throws IOException
        Gets a default root directory if one is not specified. The default root dir is /jobs/[current-user]/.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hasDefaultStoreURI

        boolean hasDefaultStoreURI()

      • getDefaultStoreURI

        URI getDefaultStoreURI()
